nodes.text: Veghash was a common vegetable dish served on the side in cantinas. It was made of a soypro-based meat substitute, a shell of grain and choya, and seasoning, all mashed together. Some beings were reminded of the importance of meat after eating this dish. Vegeparsine was an even more elaborate version.

VegHash was first mentioned in the West End Games adventure Mission to Lianna, and was also mentioned in the Smuggler's Log section of Star Wars Adventure Journal 4. When VegHash made its appearance in Star Wars Galaxies, the name was written as "Veghash" without capitalizing the "H."
